content: औषधिः, --धी {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} A herb, plant (in general); <ls>Y. 3. 276</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab>; see ओषधि. {@--2@} A medicinal herb; अचिंत्यो हि मणिमंत्रौषधीनां प्रभावः <ls>Ratn. 2.</ls> {@--3@} An herb which emits fire; विरमंति नज्वलितुमौषधयः <ls>Ki. 5. 24</ls> (तृणज्योतींषि <ls>Malli.</ls>); <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Ku. 1. 10.</ls> {@--4@} An annual or deciduous plant; °धीपतिः <ab>N.</ab> of Soma, the lord of plants.
